name: A Rogue's First Heist
description:
What is this game?

For centuries the Madorani family has been a name known only to legend. Comprised of the most skilled, and capable connoisseur of art and jewels. Able to add to their collection with even the most secretive and guarded treasures. 

Through a series of mishaps, misfortune, and down right bad luck this has changed. The fate of this Family's amazing adventures and collections now rests on the shoulders of a young thief. A thief who has yet to experience the thrill of the treasure hunt. 

He's unpracticed but fortunately, his ancestors have the skills and knowledge to make the difference. You are one of his ancestors. It is up to you to help this boy save his family name. 

Are you up to the challenge? You must use every trick in the book to make sure he succeeds, even to go so far as to "lend" the boy some money from your own ghostly savings to keep him and the family treasure out of custody. 

The Goal: 

Guide the boy to all the treasures, while dodging guards, and traps, and get him back out safely with the family Jewels!

How to Play:

Good luck! Simply clicking on the ground will place a coin to guide the thief. He gets bored if he if he stands around too long with no gold however.

(Guards are also able to be distracted by gold)

Warning:

This game is hard. But it does have checkpoints. And yes, there are multiple rooms.

Dev Notes:

The only code that wasn't made fresh for this Jam, was our menu system, and the 2D Navigation asset that we got previously from the Unity asset store. It has been correctly cited in the credits.
